item.title: Brigitte Bardot Advocates for Rescue Animals in Final Social Media Post 1 Day Before Her Death
item.description: Bardot created the Brigitte Bardot Foundation for the Welfare and Protection of Animals in 1986 after retiring from acting

item.title: Brigitte Bardot's Last Public Appearance Before Her Death Was to Celebrate Her 90th Birthday in France
item.description: The French actress and model, who died at age 91, was last seen in public in September 2024

item.description: The internet personality tells PEOPLE that he writes down his goals and sees success that way

item.title: Chris Hemsworth and Elsa Pataky Celebrate Their 15th Wedding Anniversary and the Holiday Season in Sweet Family Video
item.description: The couple, who share three children together, wed in December 2010
